description: Hook definitions for executive director automation workflow tracking and state management

hooks.name: workflow-init
hooks.description: Initialize workflow state and prepare session for executive analysis

hooks.name: document-detect
hooks.description: Detect organizational documents (RFPs, bylaws, job descriptions) and suggest analysis workflows

hooks.name: execution-tracker
hooks.description: Track workflow execution progress and update state for automation orchestration

hooks.name: workflow-cleanup
hooks.description: Checkpoint workflow state, archive analysis results, and clean up session data
